lender.name: Wesley
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and blessings are given to share.

lender.name: Soumya
lender.loan_because: I am in serious problem. I an 26 years old. I am married and ours is nuclear family. I lost my job recently. My mother in law is at hospital i require fund for her surgery and also to clear all my debts. Someone please help me
lender.occupational_info: I am an Human Resource professional. Came from a poor family background.

lender.name: MzJanice
lender.loan_because: I am one more person who believes in reaching out and helping others...Human Mankind, The Forests, Oceans & Environment, The Animal Kingdom....
lender.occupational_info:
I am a wife/mother and grandmother and I appreciate life. I am Blessed to have such a wonderful family.
I believe in treating others with respect and not to judge anyone...We are not here on this earth to judge.....
I am an Author/Poet...My first book of poetry is titled "Heart of Joy"
Joy is a state of the heart, and sharing that Joy with others fills ones heart with Love...

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to have some resources that others might not... just seems like the right thing to do and I like to think I'm a good person.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a bunch of really smart computer scientists and we provide services to a major automotive financing company.

lender.name: sherif
lender.loan_because: i am building kingdergarten schoo,i have lack funds,i am short of money,i have already started,i have reach a stage almost finish,lact capital to finised it
lender.occupational_info: i am building school,i have reach progress level,but i lack funs to finalized to school building

lender.name: kadia
lender.loan_because: I think about my life and how grateful I am for the oppourtunties god has given and the freedom of choice I have. My hearts desire is to give that opportunity to someone else
lender.occupational_info: I work in the public sector. London underground provides a transport service to the public known as 'trains'. I assist customers on a day to day basis, offering advice, giving them information and making their journey with the underground an enjoyable one

lender.name: Megafon
lender.loan_because: Our street paper is sold by people with drug related problems, psychological problems, or social problems. They raise funds to help others in need.

lender.name: vincent
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to live in a free county with lots of opportunity. I am only 2-3 generations from the situations some of these clients are in (my great grandfather came from Italy to Ohio and after a couple hard years with the railroads he bought a peanut cart--the rest is history. KIVA is a better way to help people than giving random small dollar handouts.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a lawnboy, grocery bagger, factory worker, and photographer to put myself through college. I got my liberal arts degree, worked for a salary for 10 years along with other part-time jobs, to own my own business. (Oh I'm a father of two and decent husband too). My success in being self employed is because of my hard work, and the blessings of others who gave me a chance or a big break. Most importantly the people who set me up with outside the box financing of my building. Now I'm trying to pass it on.

lender.name: ssm
lender.loan_because: I wish to spread generosity, life, and hope.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: "I will because I can". I have been truly blessed in my life and it continues today. PTL

lender.name: Gonzalo
lender.loan_because: Because of that feeling that comes after helping somebody.
lender.occupational_info: Gonzalo is originally from Venezuela, and has been able to appreciate the American experience through the eyes of a Latino, thus exploring diversity and multi-cultural issues throughout his career. As an effective public speaker and facilitator. He has addressed diverse groups that range from diplomats and delegates from all over the world, to local Latino groups in his community. He currently works as a consultant for non-profit organizations with Dela Cruz and Associates. His background in different areas like Music, Business Management, International Finance, Non-profit Management, Diversity Issues, Disaster Relief and International Relations has given him a broadened view of the globe and the issues humanity faces in its current reality. He served for two years as a missionary for the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, and has worked in prominent organizations like the United Nations, Standard and Poor's and The American Red Cross of Greater New York.

lender.name: GetStarted
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves

lender.name: kirsten
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: goldsmith

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupation: Exec. Dir. of envi. nonprofit & Llama Farmer

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I want other people to have the chance to best develop their lives in the way that they see fit.

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help.
lender.occupational_info: I fix things people feel they need to live but could easily survive without.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It is the Lord's money, not mine. It is my constant prayer that many around the world will trust on the Savior, Jesus Christ, for eternal salvation. May this site be a means to that end.
lender.occupational_info: ¿Para quién será el dolor? Sabemos que toda la creación gime a una, y a una está con dolores de parto hasta ahora. Por cuanto todos pecaron. Vuestras iniquidades han hecho división entre vosotros y vuestro Dios. Jesús ... por el gozo puesto delante de Él sufrió la cruz. Por Su propia sangre, entró una vez para siempre en el Lugar Santísimo, habiendo obtenido eterna redención. Venid a Mí todos los que estáis trabajados y cargados, y Yo os haré descansar. Se gozará vuestro corazó.

lender.name: moses
lender.loan_because: am not looking for someone to lend from
lender.occupational_info: still a student and need someone to loan from

lender.name: sky
lender.occupation: Massage, Yoga, and Martial Arts Instructor

lender.name: Clemente
lender.loan_because:
I think everybody should get an opportunity to accomplish her/his dreams, the first step sometimes is just a little one but can, with effort, transform into wonderful things!
From nothing comes nothing...
lender.occupational_info: Research in cognitive science, development and education

lender.name: Juliet
lender.loan_because: It is nice.
lender.occupational_info: I like to play with my friends.

lender.name: Rochelle
lender.loan_because: I was born lucky.
lender.occupational_info: I help university instructors use technology in their teaching.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: It's a way for us to reconnect with each other. Whether or not we live in the same place, believe the same things, or belong to certain economic groups, we all have similar hopes and experiences just by the fact that we're human beings.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and a traveler

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help in some small way when i can

lender.name: Anne, Brian Raf & Phoebe

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because:
bottom-up is the best way to go.
Way to go! Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired Probation Officer - now able to work much of the time as a volunteer for causes I believe in - especially the World Connectory project at ned.com

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because:
I want my students to be aware of the needs of other people around our world. In addition, I want them to know that when many people join together they can have a positive impact on someone's life.
"...From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked." (Luke 12:48)
lender.occupational_info: I teach 3rd grade students ranging in age from 8 to 10 years old. My students are getting lessons in economics and humanities through my lending activities as we chose who to lend to together as a class.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I think it's important for us as humans to realize that the world is bigger than just what we see around us. It is also important to me as a parent to lead by example for my daughter. Helping others is a quality that I would like her to grow up with.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have speech and/or language delays.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Parish Priest, a mother of two, a wife and a friend. All of this is my work, and my joy.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good

lender.name: The Churchills
lender.loan_because: we have a great life and want to help those who need it the most

lender.name: A Working Website
lender.loan_because: It’s the right thing to do and we want to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are the world’s most innovative website development company. We combine proven strategies with creative thinking to produce verifiable results.

lender.name: Eug and Jo
lender.loan_because: We've been blessed with an abundance; giving is one way for us to acknowledge that economic justice is elusive, but something God wants in our world and something we want to be some small part of.

lender.name: Jordi
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, and with this website, I will be able to help many people with only $25.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and learn. Im in the 8th grade and I plan on becoming a lawyer in the future.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.....
lender.occupational_info: Help schools to manage children with problems in learning or behaviour

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I have more than enough for my own needs and welcome the opportunity to help others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a college in Montana. I have one daughter and two grandchildren.

lender.name: Brian K.
lender.loan_because: I believe micro-finance is the most effective method to combat poverty around the world.

lender.name: Geoffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact on others lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with information technology for an electricity distribution company

lender.name: Ewan
lender.loan_because: because I can, and I was raised to believe you should never eat when your neighbours are hungry
lender.occupational_info: I am a technician I service the boilers that provide heat, hot water and steam for institutions and major industry are running at top efficiency.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky that what is a small thing for me to do has a huge impact for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: health charity worker

lender.name: Vivek
lender.loan_because: We're all living in one world, and our bonds of nationalism are weaker than those of our internationalism. This is what drives economy and society all around the world. By giving to others, you're not only benefiting them, but anyone to whom they're connected, as well as yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I started a KIVA Microfinance Club at my school. We aim to conduct various cell-phone recycling projects and use the profits towards micro-financing those in need around the world.

lender.occupational_info: Good

lender.occupational_info: Since I have stopped working, I have kept busy promoting critical thinking and opposing intellectual manipulation of all kinds. I travel every winter and will visit Peru in 2009.

lender.loan_because: Its such an easy way to help somebody make lasting change.

lender.loan_because: I feel blessed and honored to be a minute part of the war to lose the shackle of the abomination called poverty.

lender.loan_because: it materially improves the lives of poor families in developing nations where investment capital is not readily available to entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: The profiles are inspiring. I'm glad to be able to help.

lender.name: JohnJ
lender.loan_because: it helps people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
What keeps me ticking?: Life in general, every-day-contact to a lot of wonderfull people, my family and friends, my business contacts, my fellow warriors in the constant striving for a better place for all to live in. I believe that all people on this planet are allways doing their best to make something out of life. In the odd case were it does not seem to be like that, most of the times we have a misunderstanding based on different viewpoints resulting in miscommunication. And finally resulting in wars and other plagues. Just sitting down and finding a common ground, a common understanding, will solve most of our problems. On a planetary scale, within a country, within a region, within a city, within an organisation, within a family, and within yourselves.
Most of our "problems" can be solved by working on oneself!

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupational_info: Trying to use the internet for good.

I also maintain a show room where I treat and display first grades, and I also promote a common innitiative group of about twenty members where we do contribute small amounts of money on a weekly bases after market sales.

lender.name: Reesa & Cameron
lender.loan_because: We believe every human being deserves the right to live a life free of poverty. Everyone deserves a life full of inspiration, peace, happiness and good health. We are all in this world together and we need to help each other in good times and bad.
lender.occupational_info: Reesa is an office manager at a veterinary clinic and Cameron is a water treatment operator.

lender.occupational_info: I work for a big firm. I learn employees how they can do there work safer and reduce injuries.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help someone who may be less fortunate than I am. In hopes that I can help make a difference in their lives!

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: The notion of helping hardworking people start businesses that will help clothe and feed their family warms my heart. Thank you Kiva!

lender.name: Gerit
lender.loan_because: I have been travelling a lot in poor countries and was often overwhelmed by the vast problem of poverty which left me feeling quite hopeless. I read the book by Muhammad Yunus and for the first time I saw that there was a way to help the poorest. I'm glad I found this internet site to be able to do my small part in beating poverty in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I ensure that the products we produce are safe to use for the customer. This means lots of paper work, but it is not boring - actually sometimes a bit too exciting for my taste. :-)

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to share our resources. Micro-finance loans are an incredible way to create a more equitable world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language in Chile, to children and adults.

lender.name: DeeDee
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to have your own business - I just want to help people.

lender.loan_because: The impression seeing poor people living in indonesia was overwheling in its special way.
lender.occupational_info: Its all about developing the web.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: Det känns skönt att kunna erbjuda lite hjälp på ett relativt enkelt sätt.

lender.name: Paulusie
lender.loan_because:
I do not agree with billionaires around the world, they make billions because of us the poor neither average livings. $1,402,275 can be paid off in less than a second by a r rich man which makes millions from us. help me go pubic over this and get it paid OFF. Thanks
Paulusie

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: ...it would be a sin not to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student.

lender.name: Bilal
lender.loan_because: I want to support the cause of microfinance and entrepreneurship on all faces of the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I am a co-founder of Gumball Capital, a nonprofit that inspires and engages students to creatively raise money for microfinance. I am also a student at Stanford University.

lender.name: Bri
lender.loan_because: I want to see what people can do with my money.
lender.occupational_info: I help people communicate what they do and what they want to accomplish to the rest of the world.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do :)

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a little help sometimes to follow their dream!
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy teaching QiGong and Tai Chi - I'm doing my part to make this world healthier!

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can. It's wonderful that so little can make such a difference, a truth that I need to be reminded of daily.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: i think this is a fantastic opportunity to help people that are less fortunate than me and have not been given the same opportunities that I have had to succeed within my work.
lender.occupational_info: I help with the import/exporting of goods within Australia.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I don't believe in handouts that serve only to create dependence and complacency, while ultimately doing nothing to solve the underlying problem. Additionally, I firmly believe that those that wish to facilitate economic growth within their own environment should be given the opportunity and means to do so.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to gain the same sorts of opportunities as I'm lucky enough to have available to me, and the same degree of respect from my fellow human.

lender.name: Doug and Patricia
lender.loan_because: We've been given a second chance at life and would like to help others.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because:
the more goodness you put into the world, the better the world will be for everyone.
I also greatly admire those who are taking big steps to make life better for their families.
lender.occupational_info: Planning and executing educational programs for the global medical community

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I want to make a real difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I help children reach their highest potential

lender.name: Angie Nikoleychuk
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a perfect way to help others so that they can continue to help themselves long into the future. Success is worthless unless you can share it with others.
lender.occupational_info:
I write offline and online content for businesses in a variety of industries. In addition to writing, I also enjoy SEO, SM, branding, business, and marketing.
I'm well-known for my information obsession, bookmarking addiction, and for being a passionate (coffee) bean brat.
Outside of work, I'm a single mom who enjoys music performance, crafting, the outdoors, and any other creative outlet I can get my hands on.

lender.name: Takao
lender.loan_because: This excellent system helps me to find out someone who really needs "support".
lender.occupational_info: Working at worldwide PC manufacturer, am responsible for demand generation via online and social media marketing.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it helps.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: it is more empowering to the recipient than just giving a handout. They grow and get better at what they do. If they make a mistake they will learn from it. It is a good feeling to know you can give someone a helping hand in some small way.

lender.name: Susy
lender.loan_because: I want to effect change in developing nations. I believe that these individuals have the intelligence, creativity and business sense to ensure the happiness of themselves and their families and I would like to be a part of this change.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a professional organisation, which acts on behalf of nursery and garden owners across Australia.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I am a final year student and my parents are no more now.I dont have anybody to pay my school fees again,so am seeking for help in order to pay my school fees before am thrown out of school.
lender.occupational_info: i am a student

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I like to help hard working people

lender.name: Liana
lender.loan_because: My family and I have been blessed in so many ways and I believe it is important to give back to others less fortunate. We are Americans who live overseas and have traveled to many of the countries that are represented on the site and I have seen firsthand the dire situations these people live in. My heart breaks for them and I want to help them in some way.
lender.occupational_info: Our giving is an extension of the love and blessings we have been showered with from God.

lender.name: Sorita
lender.loan_because: Every little helps! It is an honor to help those who are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an analyst at an investment bank.

lender.name: Dominique
lender.loan_because: I want to support those who want to better themselves and their families.

lender.name: Preston
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor of human development & family studies in Connecticut (USA).

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: I am able to help others this way and teach my grandchildren the joy of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I teach eighth grade students at an inner city school. Most of our children are minorities, whose parents have never finished high school

lender.name: John and Nina
lender.loan_because: We believe in people! Everyone deserves an opportunity to try to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Lani
lender.occupational_info: I work as a case manager on a small reservation in rural New Mexico.

lender.name: Xakzen
lender.loan_because: But He said to them, "You give them something to eat!" And they said, "We have no more than five loaves and two fish, unless perhaps we go and buy food for all these people." Luke 9:13
lender.occupational_info: Software Engineer

lender.name: aax4
lender.occupational_info: http://fb.me/jimmyhan/

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: The words of a hymn describe it best: "Because I have been given much, I too must give".
lender.occupational_info: I teach university students about physics, and study the physics of electrons inside various materials.

lender.name: Cosby High School
lender.loan_because: As a history teacher I am trying to help my students see a broader picture of the world. Kiva is the perfect organization to foster an understanding of the growing interdependence of the world.
lender.occupational_info: Cosby is a public high school, where teachers work with upwards of 125 teenage students' everyday; trying to help them develop a sense of who they are and what they are capable of achieving if they put their minds to it. Kiva helps both the teachers and students see their sense of civic responsibility in the context of world issues, not just local ones.

lender.name: Cyndee
lender.loan_because: We're all connected and want the best for our families. I loan, because I want the best for all children.
lender.occupational_info: I support teachers with projects and lessons they provide our students. I wish I could be a teacher and have great respect for the people with the gift of teaching. It's an honor working with them.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I want to empower others and help stop global poverty and hunger.

lender.name: Jinu
lender.loan_because: I really want my own allowance to help many people.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Jonny
lender.loan_because: I want to help under-privileged people around the world have the opportunities they deserve.
lender.occupational_info: It's awesome!

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who's odds are stacked against them get on their feet.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizational leaders and their teams to bring out their best to create productive, meaningful and satisfying work places.

lender.name: Genna & Kevin
lender.loan_because: ...everyone deserves an opportunity to work and make themselves and the world better.
lender.occupational_info: We are a couple -- one of us studies preserving history and the other is a writer.

lender.name: Gudbrand
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help ordinary people realising their talent and skills and improving their own lives with their own effort.

lender.name: Betsi
lender.loan_because: ...even on government income, I am wealthier than so many people in this world. I want to help. ♥

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: of my belief that everyone, regardless of where they live, deserves a chance to be be successful.
lender.occupational_info: The Lord has given us many gifts. It is our job to understand how to best use them to make a positive difference in the world.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to other people's lives, by giving them the power to make changes themselves. To me, providing someone with a loan, and with the encouragement to follow their dreams, is giving them the opportunity to make a difference to their own lives and to their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working as a teaching assistant and classroom supervisor in schools, mainly with young children aged from 0-11. I am aiming to train as a Lower Primary teacher next year. I believe that every human being should have the right to access education, and so I am particularly interested in lending to individuals who are looking for funding to improve their businesses in order to afford funding for their children's education, or to groups which have an educational focus, especially for young people in developing countries.

lender.name: D Roger Maves
lender.loan_because: I've been an entrepreneur all my life and realize how important it can be to get a little help from a friend. I enjoy giving back and seeing others directly benefit from it.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software (websites) for real estate brokers and agents which help them to market themselves to their prospects.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself. I want to give back to the world some of what I have been blessed enough to receive myself.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand and train their pet dogs, so that they can achieve a more pleasurable relationship. I help keep dogs in their homes through training, as they are not as likely to be relinquished to shelters if they are well behaved and properly cared for.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I own a marketing firm that serves attorneys and law firms nationwide.

lender.name: alysia
lender.loan_because: I want to and can help make a difference in people's lives. I started a business once and know what a difference even small amounts of money can make to grow it.
lender.occupational_info: My team works to improve Google Maps.

lender.name: True
lender.loan_because: I believe it's important for those of us that have plenty to share with those who struggle. I'm grateful that Kiva makes this simpler!
lender.occupational_info: I supervise an assisted living unit that serves 6 developmentally disabled women.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I want to follow Christ's example and I believe that if you "teach a man to fish", you can equip him or her to further themself and have the chance to pass it on to others.

lender.name: Habib
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do. As well we are all human beings and we came on earth with nada and leave earth with nada. But during life some people have nada while some of us do, might as well give....
lender.occupational_info: I dont know what work is, but I know how to give away money...I go to school!!!

lender.name: Miyoung
lender.loan_because: "Teamwork makes the dream work."
lender.occupational_info: I study the brain and behavior of those with psychiatric disorders.

lender.name: Patch
lender.loan_because: my government (regardless of the party) fails to recognise the importance international aid and poverty and this allows me to still make a direct difference
lender.occupational_info: I do research around youth mental health issues and investigate the most effective treatments for mental disorders in 12-25 year olds.

lender.name: Heather & Slater
lender.loan_because: I want to be the change I wish to see in the world. (Gandhi)

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to. My own family means the world to me, and my parents always taught me to give back to others. Now I can.
lender.occupational_info: I attempt to prevent colon cancer.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I like to assist where possible. I love Peru
lender.occupational_info: I translate technology speak to business speak and vice-versa for the common good of the organization.

lender.name: Magenta
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Senta & Jan
lender.loan_because: We will give a Chance...

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in the world grow and develop their careers.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a full time student on my way to getting a Business degree.

lender.name: Alessandro
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderfull project, you can really help people and be sure that your money are going where you want. You should find a reason to not support it....and if you have found one probably you have to check better :-) For a better world made by better people
lender.occupational_info: IT Consulting

lender.name: Susanne
lender.occupational_info: I help people in companies solving their conflicts. The tool I use is called "Mediation".

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: To share is to grow.

lender.name: Bob & Justin
lender.loan_because: My Grandmother a school teacher showed me at the age of five the power of giving. I have done this with my son. We believe in a hand up not a hand out. It will be an honor to loan people this money. Thank You Kiva for making this opportunity available to my son and me. Maybe we can change the world! Bob
lender.occupational_info: I have been a contractor for many years. I build houses. I build them with my son. We do everything from the ground up. It will take us almost a year to build a home. I like to work with logs building furniture for the homes. My new home will be made of ICF's . They are stiro-foam and a great way to build. I was in Iraq for three years and now I'm in Afghanistan. I support our troops, but choose to do it in Country.
